item.title: Lauren add a quote by David Wong
item.description: "Son, the greatest trick the Devil pulled was convincing the world there was only one of him." -- David Wong

item.title: Lauren add a quote by David Wong
item.description: "Something coming back from the dead was almost always bad news. Movies taught me that. For every one Jesus you get a million zombies." -- David Wong

item.title: Lauren add a quote by david wong
item.description: "But remember, there are two ways to dehumanize someone: by dismissing them, and by idolizing them." -- david wong

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "The one you love and the one who loves you are never, ever the same person." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "All God does is watch us and kill us when we get boring. We must never, ever be boring." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "It's only after we've lost everything that we're free to do anything." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "We all die. The goal isn't to live forever, the goal is to create something that will." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Nothing of me is original. I am the combined effort of everyone I've ever known." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "I don't want to die without any scars." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "You realize that our mistrust of the future makes it hard to give up the past." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "This is your life and its ending one moment at a time." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "The unreal is more powerful than the real. Because nothing is as perfect as you can imagine it. Because its only intangible ideas, concepts, beliefs, fantasies that last. Stone crumbles. Wood rots. People, well, they die. But things as fragile as a thought, a dream, a legend, they can go on and on. If you can change the way people think. The way they see themselves. The way they see the world. You can change the way people live their lives. That's the only lasting thing you can create." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "No matter how careful you are, there's going to be the sense you missed something, the collapsed feeling under your skin that you didn't experience it all. There's that fallen heart feeling that you rushed right through the moments where you should've been paying attention. Well, get used to that feeling. That's how your whole life will feel some day. This is all practice." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "You know how they say you only hurt the ones you love? Well, it works both ways." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "When we don't know who to hate, we hate ourselves." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "If you love something set it free, but don't be surprised if it comes back with herpes." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "A girl calls and asks, "Does it hurt very much to die?" "Well, sweetheart," I tell her, "yes, but it hurts a lot more to keep living." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Parents are like God because you wanna know they're out there, and you want them to think well of you, but you really only call when you need something." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "At the time, my life just seemed too complete, and maybe we have to break everything to make something better out of ourselves." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "When did the future switch from being a promise to being a threat?" -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Lauren add a quote by L.M. Montgomery
item.description: "Isn't it nice to think that tomorrow is a new day with no mistakes in it yet?" -- L.M. Montgomery

item.title: Lauren add a quote by L.M. Montgomery
item.description: "I am simply a 'book drunkard.' Books have the same irresistible temptation for me that liquor has for its devotee. I cannot withstand them." -- L.M. Montgomery

item.title: Lauren add a quote by L.M. Montgomery
item.description: "My life is a perfect graveyard of buried hopes." -- L.M. Montgomery

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Lucy Maud Montgomery
item.description: "There's such a lot of different Annes in me. I sometimes think that is why I'm such a troublesome person. If I was just the one Anne it would be ever so much more comfortable, but then it wouldn't be half so interesting." -- Lucy Maud Montgomery

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Berkeley Breathed
item.description: "I will go to my grave in a state of abject endless fascination that we all have the capacity to become emotionally involved with a personality that doesn't exist." -- Berkeley Breathed

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Berkeley Breathed
item.description: "And just as it is with all proper grannies, she ordered me into my pink bunny jammies." -- Berkeley Breathed

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Berkeley Breathed
item.description: "Liberal, shmiberal. That should be a new word. Shmiberal: one who is assumed liberal, just because he's a professional whiner in the newspaper. If you'll read the subtext for many of those old strips, you'll find the heart of an old-fashioned Libertarian. And I'd be a Libertarian, if they weren't all a bunch of tax-dodging professional whiners." -- Berkeley Breathed

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Berkeley Breathed
item.description: "Despite what they tell you, there are simply no moral absolutes in a complex world." -- Berkeley Breathed

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Berkeley Breathed
item.description: "Oodles of noodles help blue poodles mit der strudel." -- Berkeley Breathed

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "I'm killing time while I wait for life to shower me with meaning and happiness." -- Bill Watterson
